original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa
translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma
translated: The Dhamma Paccanīyānuloma, Duka Paṭṭhānapāḷi

original: 20.1. Hetugocchaka
analyzed: hetu ga ucchaka
translated: .. The Hetu Group

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa
translated: Homage to that Blessed One, the Worthy One, the Rightly Self-awakened One.

original: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a non-cause as condition, a cause arises – by the root-cause condition. With a non-cause as condition,

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā🔽uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum dhammam paṭicca hetu ca na hetu ca dhammā  uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: a non-cause arises – by the root-cause condition. With a non-cause as condition, a cause and a non-cause arise – by the root-cause condition.

original: Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: nana hetum dhammam paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā nana hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a cause and a non-cause as condition, a cause arises – by the root-cause condition. With a cause and a non-cause as condition,

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca🔽dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum dhammam paṭicca hetu ca na hetu ca  dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na hetum ca na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetuñca
translated: a non-cause arises – by the root-cause condition. With a cause and a non-cause as condition, a cause and a non-cause arise – by the root-cause condition.🔽With a non-cause and a cause as condition, a cause arises – by the root-cause condition. With a non-cause and a cause as condition,

original: nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca nanahetuñca
analyzed: na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetuñca na na hetuñca
translated: a non-cause arises – by the root-cause condition. With a non-cause and a cause as condition,

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca hetu ca na hetu ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With dhamma that is a root-cause and with dhamma that is not a root-cause as condition, dhamma that are root-causes arise. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.🔽(Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)🔽Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ🔽paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe avigate nava  sahajāta vāram pi pe pañhā vāram pi  na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa hetukam dhamma  paṭicca ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca sa hetukaḥ
translated: With root-cause nine times, with object nine times … with non-hindrance nine times.🔽(The section on the origin should be expanded as in the case of the section on condition.)

original: ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ🔽paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko
analyzed: ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi  na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na ahetukam dhamma  paṭicca sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca sa hetukaḥ
translated: With a dhamma that is not a root-cause as condition, a dhamma that is a root-cause arises. With a dhamma that is not a root-cause as condition, a dhamma that is not a root-cause arises. With a dhamma that is not a root-cause as condition, dhammas that are root-causes and dhammas that are not root-causes arise. … three.

original: ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a dhamma that is not a root-cause as condition, a dhamma that is not a root-cause arises. With a dhamma that is not a root-cause as condition, a dhamma that is a root-cause arises. With a dhamma that is not a root-cause as condition, dhammas that are root-causes and dhammas that are not root-causes arise. … three.

original: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sahetukam ca na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a dhamma that is not a root-cause and a dhamma that is not a root-cause as condition, a dhamma that is a root-cause arises.

original: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sahetukam ca na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an unwholesome and an uncaused factor as condition, an uncaused factor arises, a condition by way of condition.🔽With an unwholesome and an uncaused factor as condition, a wholesome and an uncaused factor arises, a condition by way of condition.

original: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti🔽hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sahetukam ca na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca sa hetukaḥ ca ahetukaḥ ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti  hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With an unwholesome and an uncaused factor as condition, a wholesome, an unwholesome, and an uncaused factor arises, a condition by way of condition.

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate nava
translated: In the section on root, there are nine. In the section on object, there are six. In the section on predominance, there are five. … In the section on non-disappearance, there are nine.

original: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a factor that is not a root and is associated with roots as condition, a factor that is a root and is associated with roots arises, a condition by way of condition.

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate nava
translated: In the section on root, there are nine. … In the section on non-disappearance, there are nine.

original: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a factor that is not a root and is not associated with roots as condition, a factor that is a root and is associated with roots arises, a condition by way of condition. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
translated: In the section on root, there are nine. … In the section on non-disappearance, there are nine.

original: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum ca iva na hetu vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca hetu ca iva hetu sampayuttaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a factor that is not a root and is not dissociated from roots as condition, a factor that is a root and is associated with roots arises, a condition by way of condition. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
translated: In the section on root, there are nine. … In the section on non-disappearance, there are nine.

original: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-cause that is not causally formed as condition, a non-cause that is causally formed … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate nava
translated: In the section on root cause, there are nine. In the section on object, there are four. In the section on predominance, there are five. … In the section on mutual, there are six. … In the section on prior, there are two in the section on nutriment and two in the section on faculty. … In the section on nongreed, there are nine.
